sn45.28:4.2: “Ariyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi saupanisaṃ saparikkhāraṃ.
sn45.28:4.4: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo sammāsamādhi saupaniso saparikkhāro?
sn45.28:4.7: sammāsati.
sn45.28:4.8: Yā kho, bhikkhave, imehi sattahaṅgehi cittassa ekaggatā saparikkhāratā—
sn45.28:4.9: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo sammāsamādhi saupaniso itipi saparikkhāro itipī”ti.
